teaser: American Airlines plans to make coach seats thinner and adjust legroom in the economy section. How much is an inch worth, to both parties? How much more money with American Airlines make from the move? And will passengers be more willing to pay for upgraded seats? Also, how the NSA surveillance story may be a harbinger about the future of the internet.
byline: Mark Garrison, Aarti Shahani, Sam Beard, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Rob Schmitz, Kai Ryssdal and Scott Tong
